content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mining and smelting setup at (15.5, 70.5) - UPDATED
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) producing 43 iron ore per minute
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 72.5) containing 193 iron ore
- Burner inserter at (15.5, 73.5) fueled with 9 coal (currently blocked)
- Stone furnace at (16.0, 76.0) fueled with 20 coal (awaiting ingredients)
- Transport belt path from drill to chest (17.5, 72.5 to 25.5, 72.5)
- Small electric pole at (13.5, 70.5) providing power

### Power generation setup at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) operational (98.9 water)
- Boiler at (-5.0, 3.5) with 7 coal remaining
- Steam engine at (-0.5, 3.5) operational (165.36 steam)
- Pipe network fully functional
- Power pole network properly connected

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter operation issues (updated)
- Output blocked at burner inserter (15.5, 73.5) - ensure clear path to furnace
- Verify inserter drop positions match furnace input (3 total corrections)
- Check for ground items blocking inserter operation (1 new occurrence)

### Production chain verification (updated)
- Furnace at (16.0, 76.0) has no ingredients despite chest contents - verify inserter path
- Monitor inserter fuel levels when using burner inserters (4 total failures)
- Test production flow after making alignment changes

### Placement collision errors (continued)
- Verify target position is clear before placing entities (25 total occurrences)
- Clear old entities completely before placing new ones (4 total failures)

### Fuel management issues
- Monitor boiler fuel levels to prevent power interruptions (1 failure)
- Ensure furnaces have fuel before expecting operation (4 total failures)

### Power system monitoring
- Verify power network coverage when adding new devices
- Check power pole spacing requirements

### Belt connection rules
- Cannot connect belts directly to inserters (2 total occurrences)
- Verify source and destination entity types before belt connections

### Entity alignment issues
- Ensure furnaces are properly aligned with inserter drop points (3 corrections made)
- Verify chest positions match inserter pickup points (2 corrections made)
